description: If all you want is simple music player then Gnome Music is perfect.  If you want something more than organizing and listening to your music, you won't like it.
One of the best apps. Simple and useful. Fits Gtk3 design perfectly. Shell integration makes another nice touch. Using it every day.
Simple but fast and gets the job done beautifully.
I was looking for a simple music player to play my music collection. GNOME Music is a modern and simple user interface to do this. I'm a really happy user of this.
summary: Does what I need and nothing else

description: No notifications on gnome shell 3.20

It seems to be missing some UI could not find where to tell it about my music and it only found four albums - somehow it failed to spot the other 167 albums in the same directory (which was my user Music folder).  One of the only bits of UI it does have is search So I thought maybe if it finds the music it will add it - alas it just rudely told me that file does not exist (or something equally wrong and rude).  Really, try to construct dialogs that are more accurate and not so arrogant.   How about 'Music could not find that file.' 

I have been testing all the media players and so far this is the only one that failed to find the music.
On Fedora, I had to go through insane measures to get MP3s working. Now, the music player won't even work. Go use Rhythmbox instead.
GNOME Music is beautiful and easy to use but it didn't find all my music collection.
It didn't find any of my music the the Music folder so I had to switch to lollypop.
summary: Looks good but didn't find my music

description: I love this Music player by far the best interface I will like to see more done to it to replace Amarok because this is the currently the best on the market.
summary: Please include the minimize option and support for notifications

description: I like the interface. It's more polished than Rhythmbox and integrates well.  Gnome design language is present and just like Rhythmbox is just works. It plays local files only, but it is designed well and without clutter.
Can't add music to the library. I have my songs in ~/Music, but this app doesn't show anything. There are no options btw. Use Lollypop instead.
If you have lots of music, a complicated folder hierarchy, or like to tweak settings, then this app is not for you. However, the UI is totally fire.
Plays only music from Music folder?
No music in the app and no way to make it search for the music folder. Where is the documentation/information on how to use it?
Couldn't set my music folder.

Even though it is good enough for playing music albums stored in your music directory it is rather pointless as a general purpose audio player and for music management since it can not play any audio files outside of your music directory nor that it can be set as the default handler for audio files.
Is it that hard to implement simple drag'n drop playlist?
Music mp3 no play.

Cannot even be set as default media player. Has no dark theme, plugins, or even preferences. In my opinion, this is beat in every way by Lollypop. Still comes in second for UI, far ahead of anything below, but still quite a bit behind Lollypop.
Every day with Music. My preferred Thievery Corporation.
You can't change the music source directory. Your songs have to be located in the default music directory: ~/Music
Aus irgend einem Grund funktioniert die Anwendung nicht.

Inzwischen (Version 3.22) gut geeignet für normales tägliches Musikhören. Auch die Wiedergabelisten funktionieren gut. Das Bedienkonzept fügt sich perfekt in GNOME ein. Verfügbar sind nur die durch Tracker im eingestellten Musikordner indizierten Songs. Ein paar wünschenswerte Features fehlen noch, etwa ein Genrefilter und Metadateneditor. Für Podcasts, Hörbücher oder Webradio muss man auf andere Anwendungen ausweichen.
summary: Geeignet für einfaches Musikhören, passt sich perfekt in GNOME ein

description: Ich bin sehr zufrieden mit GNOME-Music, idealer Musikplayer für den Alltag.

Inzwischen scheinen die Bugs früherer Versionen behoben; Das Programm läuft bei mir. Allerdings kann Music wirklich nicht mehr als den Ordner ~/Music darzustellen und die Stücke abzuspielen. Wer genau das sucht, wird sich sicher freuen, alle anderen bleiben bei Rhythmbox.
Es una app sencilla que ofrece lo mínimo y necesario para organizar la colección de música.
Funciona, que es lo importante del caso, no me da error en ningún archivo de música que tengo (FLAC, AIFF, MP3, WAV, etc) y todo se ve ordenado y estético. Me gusta.
Sería bueno que organice la musica de la carpeta que el usuario escoja, no solo la de la carpera ''musica''
En effet, je cherche à créer une liste de lecture ayant comme emplacement un disque réseau.... Toujours pas trouvé, je supprime
Bien que sans fonctions très avancées, GNOME Music est un logiciel simple et efficace pour lire de la musique. Enfin une interface légère! Et un logiciel qui fait ce qu'il prétend, sans plus.

La possibilitée d'ajouter un repertoire personalisé fait cruellement defaut. Mais l'application est tres prometteuse avec son design "pas de distractions inutiles" L'integation est evidement parfaite. Voila de quoi rendre gnome encore plus attractif a mes yeux sur le plan de la productivitée.
impossible de classer personnellement sa bibliothèque.

+Лаконичный дизайн
-Нет настроек - то есть вообще нет, прям совсем. даже добавление каталогов с музыкой приходится делать посредством копирования ссылок на них в папку Music.
-Нет возможности редактирования тэгов.
-да что я тут расписываю - вообще ничерта нет - это не плеер, а дополнение к наутилусу.
Удобный плеер, без лишних элементов.
когда нет ничего и описывать нечего!
覺得還不錯，但是沒辦法設爲預設播放器
summary: 希望可以設爲預設播放器

description:
GNOME MUSIC可以满足基本的聆听音乐需求了
但是并不是所有人都只听古典
在线查找歌词，
EQ均衡器，音量均衡
DLNA，网络媒体查找
ID3自动矫错
这些现代的甚至上个世代的基本功能，都没有做到
GNOME音乐要走的路还很长,
顺便回复楼下，设置预设程序应该在GNOME桌面的设置里面找，而不是在应用里
We need EQ,DLNA ,lyric and more.
do it,it's right,just do it.
summary: 完成了基本的需求，还需要更多高级功能
